alert.note: Alert for Cass; Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Clay, northwestern Wilkin, eastern Ransom, southeastern Cass, Richland and eastern Sargent Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 603 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Leonard to near Claire City. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Horace, Hankinson, Kindred, Milnor, Lidgerwood, Wyndmere and Abercrombie. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Minnesota...and southeastern North Dakota.
